snippet: Haas had a second straight four-under-par 67 and built a one-shot lead over Graham DeLaet going into the final round of the Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
abstract: Bill Haas takes third-round lead at Valspar Championship golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Haas had a second straight four-under-par 67 and built a one-shot lead over Graham DeLaet going into the final round of the Valspar Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
